ygData.subject: Re: PVP
ygData.msgSnippet: hey i play on pvp teams server vallon-zek i have a 9 wizard (darkelf). On Vallon-Zek and Tallon-Zek they have teams. The team are Human-human erudite and
ygData.messageBody:
hey i play on pvp teams server vallon-zek i have
a 9 wizard (darkelf). On Vallon-Zek and Tallon-Zek
they have teams. The team are Human-human erudite and
barbarian. then you have th Elfs-half elf wood elf and
highelf. then you have the shorties-dwarf gnome and
haflings. and last but not least you have the evils-iskars
trolls ogres and darkelf. On this server you can attack
anyone in a 8 lvl range from you 8 lvl ahead or 8 lvls
below(ex. a lvl 14 can attack a lvl 6 and a lvl 22 can
attack a lvl 14. also on these server you have the play
nice rules. i strongly suggest you join vallon-zek and
join me and my friends alliance. to contact me on the
server Send a tell to Draztic (lvl 9 dark elf wizard)
